name: Doktor Kale's Creature Constructor
description:
Step into Doktor Kale's laboratory.

Marvel at the creatures combined and mashed. Puzzle at why a creature dislikes Scope Creep, yet enjoys Unbudgeted Kickstarters.

Doktor Kale's Creature Constructor is a monster generator, that fuses body parts together and produces descriptions - each monster generated has a location, habitat, disposition and a set of likes/dislikes.

So, what kind of beast are you?

  • Over 27,000 different monster configurations
  • Combine with Doktor Kale's Robot Constructor to make Cyborgs (with a massive near 350,000 combinations)
  • Each monster has a list of likes/dislikes as well as a habitat, disposition and location
  • Option to save monster image to file (for easy use as twitter icons!), or the monster image + bio.

Requires 32 bit Java 1.6 to run (update your Java anyway)
